verses.name: Mark 3:23
verses.text: And he called them unto him, and said unto them in parables, How can Satan cast out Satan?

verses.name: Mark 3:24
verses.text: And if a kingdom be divided against itself, that kingdom cannot stand.

verses.name: Mark 3:25
verses.text: And if a house be divided against itself, that house cannot stand.

verses.name: Mark 3:26
verses.text: And if Satan rise up against himself, and be divided, he cannot stand, but hath an end.

verses.name: Mark 3:27
verses.text: No man can enter into a strong man’s house, and spoil his goods, except he will first bind the strong man; and then he will spoil his house.
